title: I Want to Do You’s Special Training!
detail_text: <:th_ch0211/>You! Teach me how you train on the beach!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0105/>Sure, sure~! I train on the beach to strengthen my legs and lower back~ But why’d you ask me so suddenly?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0211/>Kasumi was complimenting your methods.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0105/>Kasumi-chan?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0211/>Yeah. She said that Aqours’ training is really tough, but spoke highly of how much effort you put into your training, which is one reason why she works hard too.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0105/>Huh? Really!?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0211/>Kasumi said so, so I believe it! I’ll try not to whine too much, but I’d like to be complimented while I’m training too! You, please teach me!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0105/>Ahaha! Lanzhu-chan, you’re so funny~!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0211/>Kyah! You’re already complimenting me! Come on, let’s train! I can handle anything you throw at me!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0105/>Alright, Lanzhu-chan, I’ll come up with a special training routine just for you!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0000/>Translated by SIFAStheatre and Idol Story<:dt_line_end/>
